name: datepicker
description: Alternative customizable web component used to pick a date in a form input

scripts.build: babel src/datepicker.js -d dist --presets=@babel/preset-env && css-minify -d src -o dist && uglifyjs dist/datepicker.js -o 'dist/datepicker.min.js' && rm dist/datepicker.js

author: Erik Barale
